attributes.action: Vote of no confidence get Boris out
attributes.additional_details: We want the Boris Johnson to resign he has broken all the trust with the public and something needs to be done he's broke covid 19 rules while use public are getting punished it's not one rule for one and one for another he's time in office has gone past its due buy date so let use as members of the public have a say on a no confidence vote
attributes.background: We the members of public want to have a vote of no confidence and get the prime minister to resign

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
